title: kalpaka mAtA
sahitya:
kalpaka mAtA kanindaruL tA tA


anupallavi

  alpa vAzhvilE aDimaiyen manadai Ashaip-pEygaL piDitt-ATTuvadozhiya 


caraNam    kapaTa vESamiTTu naDippadu kaNDu karuttil unakkuk-kOpamA ammA nin
kamala caraNam aladhu vEru gati Edu kapAlIshapriyE en tAyE
saphala manadil unran tiruvaDi bhajanaiyait-tavira vEru ninaivu kanavilunDO
tanjam ammA ennait-taLLi viDuvadu dayAnNidi unakku dharmamalla perumaiyalla
